src:
Zijeh pakovao, Ajaks dobio petu u nizu
Cvole hrabro poginuo - 2:4 (1:3)

01 Nov 2019

Ajaks je uspešno prebrodio gostovanje u Cvoleu, upisao novu pobedu od 4:2 i uvećao bodovnu prednost na tabeli Eredivizije, a ono što upada u oči na prvi pogled je da je kapiten Kopljanika Dušan Tadić posle dosta vremena uspeo da završi meč, a da ne upiše ni gol ni asistenciju. Naravno, opet je Srbin dejstvovao kao lider na terenu, a njegov poletni napad završio je posao za svega 20 minuta.
Dva puta Kvinsi Promes i jednom David Neres lako su nadigrali domaću odbranu i doneli veliku prednost timu Erika ten Haga od 3:0.
Shvativši da će odbranom samo doživeti katastrofu domaći fudbaleri su se oslobodili, a posle kiksa odbrane Kopljanika u 35. minutu Gustavo Hamer je smanjio rezultat. Zabrinuli su se gostujući fanovi za trenutak u 62. minutu kada je Mustafa Sajmak smanjio rezultat na 2:3, ali je na kraju to bilo sve što je Cvole prikazao.
Ajaks je iskusno sačuvao prednost, a posle još jedne lepe akcije Zijeh je drugom asistencijom na meču omogućio još jedan pogodak Davidu Neresu za konačnih i zasluženih 4:2 u 88. minutu.
Ovom pobedom (petom vezanom) Ajaks je pobegao pratiocima na devet bodova razlike i videćemo ko će uspeti da ga isprati tokom vikenda. 

HOLANDIJA 1 - 12. kolo

PetakCvole - Ajaks 2:4 (0:3)/Hamer 35, Sajmak 62 - Promes 6, 11, Neres 20, 88/

text:
Ya'x packed, Ajax got fifth in a row
Zvole Bravely Killed - 2: 4 (1: 3)

01 Nov 2019

Ajax successfully survived the away game at Zwolle, registered a new 4: 2 victory and increased their scoring advantage on the Eredivision table. he scored neither a goal nor an assist. Of course, again, the Serb acted as a leader on the ground, and his takeoff attack completed the job in just 20 minutes.
Twice Queens Promes and David Neres once easily outplayed the home defense and brought a great 3-0 lead to Eric Ten Hague.
Realizing that the defense would only be catastrophic, the home footballers freed themselves, and after a snap of the Kopljanik defense in the 35th minute, Gustavo Hamer reduced the score. The visiting fans were worried for a moment in the 62nd minute when Mustafa Sajmak reduced the score to 2: 3, but in the end it was all that Zvole showed.
Ajax experienced the advantage, and after another nice action, Zijeh gave another assist to David Neres for the final and well-deserved 4-2 in the 88th minute.
With this win (tied for fifth), Ajax escaped the runners-up with nine points difference and we will see who will be able to wash him out over the weekend.

NETHERLANDS 1 - Round 12
